proposal: Hello Baby Kitten Coin enthusiasts, we've heard you've been taking giant leaps for kitten-kind! With your impressive 218 holders in the BSC network, it's clear you're not kitten around. We have some tools that might purr-suade you to take things up a notch. Imagine creating your own DEX or deploying a blockchain-based lottery. You could even create an ERC20 Staking & Yield Farming for your BKC tokens. All this while helping cats around the world, now that's the cat's meow! See my profile for demo and details.
